actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT
  DATE_FORMAT(s.expiration, '%Y-%m') AS month,
  COUNT(DISTINCT s.id) AS subscriptions,
	ROUND( SUM(
		CASE
			WHEN s.created >= DATE_SUB(s.created, INTERVAL 12 MONTH) THEN
				s.initial_amount / 12
			ELSE
				s.recurring_amount / 12
		END
	), 2 ) AS mrr,
	GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT s.id SEPARATOR ',') as subscription_ids
FROM wp_edd_subscriptions s
WHERE s.expiration > DATE_SUB(DATE_ADD(LAST_DAY(NOW()), INTERVAL 1 DAY), INTERVAL 2 YEAR)
	AND status = 'cancelled'
	AND notes NOT LIKE '%cancelled by gateway%'
	AND s.expiration < LAST_DAY(NOW())
GROUP BY month;
